ab.s: Horus Sema-tawy, Two Ladies Sema-tawy, Golden Horus [Qa-shuty], King of Upper and Lower Egypt ìçπ[Nebhepetra]ìç∫, who lives forever like Re.
His true and trusted servant, who does everything that he praises in the course of every day, [the sealer (?)] An[tef]nakht/On[uris]nakht, who says:
I spent years(?) in the house of Khety,

the royal palace - its every chamber - being under my control, making firm the entire royal palace, {making firm the entire royal palace}, making satisfied the venerable gods in the temples of Upper Egypt:

the overseer of sculptors of [... ... ..., the overseer] of the ...?... and the artisans(?), the overseer of the quarry-workers(?), the overseer of the [...]-persons, the over[seer of ... ... ... Antefnakht]
